title: David De Gea (Spain) - Match 3 Preview - 2018 FIFA World Cupâ„¢

json.text: Above all, you have to maintain your concentration.
We know all about Cristiano and how he plays.
He's unpredictable, he can do anything.
He's two-footed and strikes the ball very well.
He's a great header of the ball as well.
But it's not just Cristiano.  They have a great team.  They have great players.
Cristiano didn't win the European Championships on his own.  They're a great team.
Cristiano is obviously the star player and I think he's a great player.
We'll have to be strong defensively and play well to stop them.
